Goal Representation:
Reset goals: The sub-goals are: 
['1. Identify the bathroom sink.', '2. Fill the sink with water to the desired level.', '3. Add soap
 to create soapy water.']

def in_bathroom(sink:item):
    # Function to check if a sink is in the bathroom
    symbol in_bathroom=exists room: item : is_bathroom(room) and inside(sink, room)
    return in_bathroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists sink: item : is_sink(sink) and in_bathroom(sink):
            # If a bathroom sink is already identified, approach it
            bind sink: item where:
                is_sink(sink) and in_bathroom(sink)
            achieve close_char(char, sink)

        else:
            # Check all sinks that have not been visited
            foreach sink: item:
                if is_sink(sink) and not visited(sink):
                    observe(sink, "Check if this is a bathroom sink")

behavior fill_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if exists faucet: item : is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet) # Turn on the faucet to fill the sink with water
            achieve has_water(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet) # Turn off the faucet once the sink is filled to the desired
 water level
        else:
            achieve has_water(sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and close_char(char, sink)
        fill_sink_with_water(sink)

def is_soap_near_sink(sink:item):
    # Function to check if there is soap near the sink
    symbol soap_near_sink=exists o: item : is_soap(o) and close(o, sink)
    return soap_near_sink

behavior add_soap_to_water(soap:item, sink:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind sink: item where:
            is_sink(sink) and id[sink]==42
        # Select sink with ID 42
        if is_soap_near_sink(sink):
            # Check if there is soap near the sink
            bind soap: item where:
                is_soap(soap) and close(soap, sink)
            # Select soap near the sink
            add_soap_to_water(soap, sink)
        else:
            # If soap is not near the sink, initiate exploration to locate the soap
            foreach soap: item:
                if is_soap(soap) and not visited(soap):
                    observe(soap, "Check is the soap close to the sink")
